claim_summary: The Arkansas Administrative Code defines a Provider‑Led Arkansas Shared Savings Entity (PASSE) as a risk‑based provider organization that is 51% owned by participating providers and includes a DD provider, a BH provider, a hospital organization, a physician practice and a pharmacist; the regulation requires PASSE entities to be licensed and demonstrate network adequacy【725762300732441†L74-L101】【725762300732441†L166-L176】.

source.title: Ark. Admin. Code 016.06.17‑017 – Provider‑Led Arkansas Shared Savings Entity Program, Phase 1
source.issuing_body: Arkansas Department of Human Services, Division of Medical Services
